item.title: Dockerize Bookstore System
item.description: The bookstore project is not officially finished, so a lot of changes might happen. Github link for the entire project will be available after the project is concluded. 0. Why? As a wealth of components are being added to my bookstore system, it is growing increasingly complex, putting forward a few problems. Multiple middlewares and databases clutter up local storage, with configuration files, log files, data files scattered all over the place.
